trans-unit.source: adapya-entirex is a pure Python package: it does not require compilation of extensions.
trans-unit.target: adapya-entirex 는 순수 Python 패키지로 확장 컴파일이 필요하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: adapya-entirex is a services library for persistent messaging using the Advanced Communication Interface (ACI) with the EntireX Broker from Software AG.
trans-unit.target: adapya-entirex 는 Software AG의 EntireX Broker와 함께 ACI (Advanced Communication Interface)를 사용하는 영구 메시징을위한 서비스 라이브러리입니다.

trans-unit.source: About webMethods EntireX: https://resources.softwareag.com/application-modernization/webmethods-entirex
trans-unit.target: webMethods EntireX 정보 : https://resources.softwareag.com/application-modernization/webmethods-entirex

trans-unit.source: Copyright 2004-ThisYear Software AG
trans-unit.target: Copyright 2004-ThisYear Software AG

trans-unit.source: Details of adapya-entirex: https://softwareag.github.io/adapya-entirex/index.html
trans-unit.target: adapya-entirex의 세부 사항 : https://softwareag.github.io/adapya-entirex/index.html

trans-unit.source: EntireX is a component in the webMethods high-performance communication infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: EntireX는 webMethods 고성능 통신 인프라의 구성 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Install and update with the Python package manager:
trans-unit.target: Python 패키지 관리자로 설치 및 업데이트합니다.

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 설치

trans-unit.source: It has been used on Linux, Solaris and Windows.
trans-unit.target: Linux, Solaris 및 Windows에서 사용되었습니다.

trans-unit.target: 특허

trans-unit.source: Links
trans-unit.target: 연결

trans-unit.source: Prerequisite for adapya is Python version 2.7 or 3.5 and above.
trans-unit.target: adapya의 전제 조건은 Python 버전 2.7 또는 3.5 이상입니다.

trans-unit.source: adapya-entirex - Persistent messaging with webMethods EntireX Broker
trans-unit.target: adapya-entirex-webMethods EntireX Broker를 사용한 영구 메시징

trans-unit.source: adapya-entirex is part of a set of Python packages including adapya-adabas a client library for Adabas database access.
trans-unit.target: adapya-entirex는 Adabas 데이터베이스 액세스를위한 클라이언트 라이브러리 인 adapya-adabas를 포함한 Python 패키지 세트의 일부입니다.

trans-unit.source: webMethods EntireX documentation: http://techcommunity.softwareag.com/ecosystem/documentation/webmethods/entirex/entirex_vers.htm
trans-unit.target: webMethods EntireX 문서 : http://techcommunity.softwareag.com/ecosystem/documentation/webmethods/entirex/entirex_vers.htm
